review: Dr Karthik is very friendly person and his explanation about the problem is very clear. He is carefully listening all the queries raised by us and giving clear direction . He can be easily reachable for any urgent discussions.
The doctor examines every movement of the baby carefully. He listens patiently to all the queries and explains very well each and every conditions.

We are consulting with Dr Kartick since first vaccination of our baby and prefer him till date. He listens your worries very patiently and answers all queries. We are very happy and strongly recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Karthik is extremely good when it comes for our little ones. I feel my kids are in safe hands. My elder daughter who is 6 yr old now has all her vaccinations and treatment only with him. Now, for my younger one too I am consulting only with him. His treatment, prescribing apt medicines, explaining the exact health condition of the kid everything is too good. Thank you doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ** ** *****  He takes enough time to get to know all the details about the baby and writes it down in the file.  So it's easy for any other doctor to know the history of the child.  He also suggests home remedies for few illness than medicines and he is kind enough to answer whatsapp queries too.  So I never felt like changing to any other doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Karthik is our Baby's pediatrician since his birth. Everytime we visit him he checks the baby thoroughly and writes a detailed note in his prescription. Have visited him for regular checkups , vaccination and also video consulted through practo few times. We are always satisfied with his recommendation on medicine, baby food, Baby care etc and doctor answers all our queries patiently .  Thank you Doctor !

tags: Doctor friendliness,

We are very much pleased the way the doctor attends to the care. The doctor checks point to point in a very calibrated manner. The doctor records all the prescriptions in the file in a very neat and lucid manner. And the medicines recommended by him cures the ailment very soon.The doctor is highly recommended.
